Module org.nasdanika.drawio
Package org.nasdanika.drawio

Interface Document

All Superinterfaces:
Element, Element, Marked
public interface Document extends Element
Represents the root mxfile element.
Author:
Pavel

  • Method Details

    • getPages

      List<Page> getPages()
      Returns:
      a list of pages. This list supports add() method to insert pages from other documents. The add() method creates a clone of the page passed as a parameter.

    • createPage

      Page createPage()
      Returns:
      Creates a new page and adds it to the list of pages.

    • toHtml

      String toHtml(Boolean compress, String viewer) throws TransformerException, IOException
      Parameters:
      compress - If null keeps the original compression setting. If not null forces either compressed (TRUE) or uncompressed (FALSE). This can be used to generate HTML tags with compressed document while keeping the source document uncompressed so it can be manually inspected, edited, diffed, and merged.
      viewer - URL of the viewer script. Default value is used if null.
      Returns:
      div tag with the embedded document which can be inserted into HTML pages.
      Throws:
      TransformerException
      IOException

    • save

      String save(Boolean compress) throws TransformerException, IOException
      Saves the document to String.
      Parameters:
      compress - If null keeps the original compression setting. If not null forces either compressed (TRUE) or uncompressed (FALSE). This can be used to generate HTML tags with compressed document while keeping the source document uncompressed so it can be manually inspected, edited, diffed, and merged.
      Returns:
      Document string.
      Throws:
      TransformerException
      IOException
